resources.string: A run-of-the-mill lumber mill. The lumber mill helps produce more lumber for your town. A counter is added for every wood resource card you draft. Remove %s counters to gain 1 wood.
Great for smelting. The smeltery helps produce more iron for your town. A counter is added for every iron resource card you draft. Remove %s counters to gain 1 iron.
The Mason is where villagers go to rock. The Mason helps produce more stone for your town. A counter is added for every stone resource card you draft. Remove %s counters to gain 1 stone.

Not all that glitters is gold, but everything here is gold. The jeweler helps produce more gold for your town. A counter is added for every gold resource card you draft. Remove %s counters to gain 1 gold
A magical well. The mana well helps produce more mana for your town. A counter is added for every mana resource card you draft. Remove %s counters to gain 1 mana.
